The question uses the no duplicates option. This means a field may accept a range of words but if the same word is entered into more than one field it will only gain one mark for that word. The question syntax uses using the boolean option. So here it has been entered as [gold|silver|bronze] . Here is the question.
What are the medals that can be won in the olympic games?
Enter the same value twice or, e.g. gold, gold, silver. It will mark all answers correct with a tick, but if you notice the score will be 2 rather than three.
{gold|silver|bronze} {gold|silver|bronze} {gold|silver|bronze}
